altTitles.ja: ドールズフロントライン　電撃コミックアンソロジー

description.en:
Official manga anthology from Dengeki Comics NEXT of the hit mobile game, Dolls' Frontline (Girls' Frontline Japanese's title), by various manga artists.

---
**Volume 1**
**Cover**: [Shizuki Hitomi](https://mangadex.org/author/c52dc8cf-eae7-49a1-b658-6d4b8d5ab4c5)

**Author list**:
1. Mishima Hiroji
2. IAPOC
3. Hitsujibako
4. Nujima
5. EXCEL
6. Kaltoma
7. ku-ba
8. Mappaninatta
9. Mafuyu
10. Usuki
11. Ishizaka Kenta
12. Kinosaki Arima
13. Momose
---
**Volume 2**
**Cover**: MIYA*KI
**SD characters**: [Kinosaki Arima](https://mangadex.org/author/efeb8c4d-a44f-4ecd-9350-7c7c0e936349)

**Author list**:
1. Mishima Hiroji
2. Kaltoma
3. EXCEL
4. Mappaninatta
5. Syoukaki
6. Suzugamori Chika
7. Murakami Meishi
8. Kinosaki Arima
9. Fuufuu
10. REI
11. Wosakana
12. Momose
13. Hitsujibako
---
**Volume 3**
**Cover**: daito
**SD characters**: [Ichifuji Nitaka](https://mangadex.org/author/d65b06f1-30cd-4f08-9963-9fd3db9b8315)

**Author list**:
1. Mishima Hiroji
2. Kaltoma
3. Akahito
4. Arisaka K
5. Ichifuji Nitaka
6. Dekairuka
7. Nankyoku Sango
8. IAPOC
9. Danimaru
10. Heijitsu
---
**Volume 4**
**Cover**: DSmile

**Author list**:
1. Mishima Hiroji
2. abua
3. Kaltoma
4. Kirikirimai
5. Be-con
6. Dekairuka
7. IAPOC
8. Rida
9. KRSG
10. Hirayan
11. Ichifuji Nitaka
12. Suzugamori Chika
---
**Volume 5**
**Cover**: NEKOYA (猫屋)

**Author list**:
1. Kaltoma
2. Kumasawa
3. Ichifuji Nitaka
4. Hisanoki Toki
5. Kemejiho
6. IAPOC
7. Nankyoku Sango
8. Rida
9. Ariyoshi Gen
10. Ichigota Ruto
11. Hitsujibako
